metadata.title: 500m Mesh Depth-sounding Data by JODC

creators.name: Marine Information Service Office, Japan Oceanographic Data Center

metadata.description: The JODC-Expert Grid data for Geographic - 500m) J-EGG500 are bathymetric data and have been circulated as 500m meshed data on Lambert's conformal conic projection.  The data set includes three areas: (1) latitude: N 34 to 46 (degrees), longitude : E 135 to 148 (degrees)  (2) latitude: N 30 to 38 (degrees), longitude : E 128 to 144 (degrees)  and (3) latitude: N 24 to 30 (degrees), longitude : E 122 to 132 (degrees).
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To archive bathymetric data.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: Contact JODC for permission.
